price: Gara Muusaatti beeysisa goone “ulee keetiin galaana rukuti” jechuun. [Yeroma inni dhahu] qoqqoodamee Kutaan qoodama isaa hunduu akka gaara guddaa ta’e.
arabic: فَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱضۡرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلۡبَحۡرَۖ فَٱنفَلَقَ فَكَانَ كُلُّ فِرۡقٖ كَٱلطَّوۡدِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-awḥaynā ilā mūsā ani iḍ'rib biʿaṣāka al-baḥra fa-infalaqa fakāna kullu fir'qin kal-ṭawdi al-ʿaẓīmi
